title: GitSorted Task Item
description: A task item stored in a GitSorted todo project (items/<uuid>.json).

id.description: UUID v4 identifier. Must match the filename without .json.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp. Set once at creation, never changed.

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp. Updated on every mutation. Used for conflict resolution.

completed.description: Whether the item is marked as done.

completedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp. Set when completed becomes true.

shortDescription.description: The item's title or brief summary.

listOrder.description: Sort position in the list. Lower values appear first.

deadline.description: ISO 8601 timestamp for the due date.

reminders.description: Deadline-relative reminder offset codes. '0' = at deadline, '15m' = 15 min before, '1h' = 1 hour before, '1d' = 1 day before, '1w' = 1 week before. Requires a deadline to be set.

labels.description: Tags assigned to this item. Each label should exist in metadata.json.

url.description: A related URL (e.g. issue tracker link).
